body: Why did they remove Broken world and Revanged?
body_tagged: Why did they remove Broken world and Revanged?
title: Question if i may?

replies.body: They didn't remove broken world, but they did make some changes. Ravaged was removed, for reasons I don't know. The gameplay may have been flawed.
replies.body_tagged: They didn't remove broken world, but they did make some changes. Ravaged was removed, for reasons I don't know. The gameplay may have been flawed.

replies.body: Broken World has been edited and put back into the rotations. Ravaged/Ravenged was apparently stolen.
replies.body_tagged: Broken World has been edited and put back into the rotations. Ravaged/Ravenged was apparently stolen.

replies.body: Somebody submitted Ravaged a while ago on MC Zone I think, but then wanted it taken out on Avicus.
replies.body_tagged: Somebody submitted Ravaged a while ago on MC Zone I think, but then wanted it taken out on Avicus.

replies.body: What a shame :( I liked Ravaged.
replies.body_tagged: What a shame :( I liked Ravaged.

reply_to.body: Somebody submitted Ravaged a while ago on MC Zone I think, but then wanted it taken out on Avicus.
reply_to.body_tagged: Somebody submitted Ravaged a while ago on MC Zone I think, but then wanted it taken out on Avicus.

replies.body: Broken World is a completely ruined map. It's just a bunch of floating islands stacked on top of each other.. .-.
replies.body_tagged: Broken World is a completely ruined map. It's just a bunch of floating islands stacked on top of each other.. .-.

replies.body: Even the islands weren't that big. It was easy to fall into the void or get knocked into it.
replies.body_tagged: Even the islands weren't that big. It was easy to fall into the void or get knocked into it.

replies.body: But is broken world broken ages?
replies.body_tagged: But is broken world broken ages?

replies.body:
They're two different maps ^ :P

And Shiro once told me that they made Broken World as they missed Sky Wars XD
